radiobtn.coffee

radiobtn

given optional string as name and optional string as value and object as hash of html attributes then return an html input tag

html <label class="radio"> <input type="radio" name="foo" /> Foo </label> 

module.exports = (name, display, value, options) ->
  if typeof name is 'object'
    options = name
    name = null
  else if typeof display is 'object'
    options = display
    display = null
  else if typeof value is 'object'
    options = value
    value = null

  addClass = (klass, classes) -> ("#{klass} #{classes || ''}").trim()

  options ?= {}
  options.label ?= {}
  options.label['class'] = addClass('radio', options.label['class']) unless (options.label['class'] or '').match(/radio/)
  options.input ?= {}
  options.input.name = name
  options.input.value = value
  options.input.type = 'radio'
  
  label options.label, -> 
    input options.input
    text display || name
